description:
It’s Sieg vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!  Why would Kaiba interfere in his own tournament?  The answers may lie in the very origins of KaibaCorp and the invention of the Duel Disk!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaiba Steps In! Grand Prix Finals
海馬乱入! グランプリ決勝戦
